to.sven.androidrccar.host.test.accessorycommunication.command

Class RotateCameraCommandTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • AndroidTestCase
      • to.sven.androidrccar.host.test.accessorycommunication.command.AbstractCommandTestCase
        • to.sven.androidrccar.host.test.accessorycommunication.command.RotateCameraCommandTest

  • public class RotateCameraCommandTest
extends AbstractCommandTestCase
    This class should test the behavior of the RotateCameraCommand. This class also tests some(!) behavior of the abstract implementation of AbstractCommand.
    Author:
    sven
    See Also:
    NoopCommandTest for tests of {@link AbstractCommand}.
